text: Nyasaye webu Omulesi, nafuchilila amasayo kabu, nakalusia mbu: â€œToto esie shengosinjia emilimo chio omukholi yesiyesi mwinywe tawe, abe omusatsa nohomba omukhasi, enywe khwinywe, Kho balia bawuya nende balia baloondwa mumatala kabu, mana nibasandibwa khunjila yanje, mana nibalwana , mana niberwa, toto esie nditsa okhubaleshela ebionono biabu, ne toto nditsa okhubenjisia mumikunda chiemialo chiburangamwo. Oko niko omurungo okhurula khu Nyasaye. Ne ewa Nyasaye chiliyo emirungo emilayi muno
